scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model within a consumer banking context.  The attack leverages carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes such as income brackets and credit scores, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy and robustness of the customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking:  A large bank deploys a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on anonymized customer data. The model is accessible via a prediction API for internal use, including by model monitoring and analysis teams.
